algorithms.PS256: RSASSA-PSS using SHA-256 and MGF1 with SHA-256
algorithms.PS384: RSASSA-PSS using SHA-384 and MGF1 with SHA-384
algorithms.PS512: RSASSA-PSS using SHA-512 and MGF1 with SHA-512
algorithms.none: No digital signature or MAC performed

jwt-parser.cardDescription: Decode and inspect JWT tokens to view header and payload information.

claims.ace_profile: ACE profile a token is supposed to be used with.
claims.at_use_nbr: Number of API requests for which the access token can be used
claims.attest: Attestation level as defined in SHAKEN framework
claims.azp: Authorized party - the party to which the ID Token was issued
claims.email_verified: True if the e-mail address has been verified; otherwise false
claims.may_act: Authorized Actor - the party that is authorized to become the actor
claims.name: Full name
claims.nonce: Value used to associate a Client session with an ID Token
claims.origid: Originating Identifier as defined in SHAKEN framework
claims.phone_number_verified: True if the phone number has been verified; otherwise false
claims.preferred_username: Shorthand name by which the End-User wishes to be referred to
claims.sip_cseq_num: SIP CSeq numeric header field parameter value
claims.sip_from_tag: SIP From tag header field parameter value
claims.sip_via_branch: SIP Via branch header field parameter value
claims.sub_jwk: Public key used to check the signature of an ID Token
claims.updated_at: Time the information was last updated
claims.vc: Verifiable Credential as specified in the W3C Recommendation
claims.vp: Verifiable Presentation as specified in the W3C Recommendation

jwt-parser.enterValidJwt: Please enter a valid JWT token to decode.
jwt-parser.headerDescription: JWT header contains metadata about the token.
jwt-parser.label: JWT to decode
jwt-parser.noClaims: No claims found in this section.
jwt-parser.payloadDescription: JWT payload contains the claims and data.
